hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ -f "/usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh" ]; then . /usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh fi
GIT_BRANCH_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_BRANCH} | cut -d "/" -f 2` GIT_COMMIT_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_COMMIT} | cut -c1-7`
cd docker/pic-sure-hpds
docker build --build-arg http_proxy=$http_proxy --build-arg https_proxy=$http_proxy --build-arg no_proxy="$no_proxy" \ --build-arg HTTP_PROXY=$http_proxy --build-arg HTTPS_PROXY=$http_proxy --build-arg NO_PROXY="$no_proxy" \ -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} . docker tag hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds:LATEST cd ../pic-sure-hpds-etl docker build --build-arg http_proxy=$http_proxy --build-arg https_proxy=$http_proxy --build-arg no_proxy="$no_proxy" \ --build-arg HTTP_PROXY=$http_proxy --build-arg HTTPS_PROXY=$http_proxy --build-arg NO_PROXY="$no_proxy" \ -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} . docker tag hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:LATEST cd ../../
